|voice = <!-- Please do not add voice actor unless you're able to find a reliable source (Wikipedia is NOT a reliable source) proving who the voice actor of this character is. Thank You for your cooperation. -->
|appearance = "[[Let Them Eat Goo]]"
}}
The '''Vegan Boy''' is a [[South Park Elementary]] student who appears in [[Season Twenty-Three]] episode, "[[Let Them Eat Goo]]". His name was not revealed. When [[Nichole Daniels|Nichole]] and [[Bebe Stevens|Bebe]] argued with [[Eric Cartman]], wanting healthy food to be served in school, he immediately joined the discussion. He joined the girls' side, asking for vegan food in school.

==Appearance==
The Vegan Boy has dark brown hair. He wears a large yellow long-sleeved shirt with "VEGAN" in green written on it, blue pants, and black shoes. He is much shorter than the 4th graders.

<gallery widths="160" spacing="small" caption="Images of the Vegan Boy">
VeganBoy1.png|The vegan boy talking to 4th grade girls.
VeganBoy2.png|The vegan boy trying to argue with [[Eric Cartman|Cartman]].
</gallery>

==Quotes==
*''Yeah! I want Vegan food!''
*''Young voices matter!''
